seo.title: Landing Pages for Lead Generation | Metis Web Agency
seo.description: High-converting landing pages for campaigns and offers: clear messaging, strong CTAs, GA4/GTM key events, and continuous optimization to generate real leads.

content.title: Landing pages that turn clicks into real leads
content.subtitle: One page, one goal: enquiry, booking, or quote request.
content.body: When you run Ads or promote an offer, traffic must land on a page built to convert. We build fast, clear, measurable landing pages: copy, structure, proof and conversion tracking.

content.title: If you send paid traffic to your homepage, you’re often wasting budget
content.subtitle: A landing page removes distractions and guides the user to one action.
content.body: A strong landing page starts from a clear offer and a measurable action. No fluff: a headline people understand, essential content, proof, repeated CTAs in the right spots, and clean tracking.

columns.title: One message
columns.subtitle: Offer + promise + proof
columns.description: We align ad and page: same promise, same terms, same expectations. This improves lead quality and conversion rate.

columns.title: Conversion tracking
columns.subtitle: GA4/GTM + key events
columns.description: We track enquiries, WhatsApp clicks, calls and form submissions. Knowing what works is part of the job—not an add-on.

columns.title: Optimization
columns.subtitle: CRO & testing
columns.description: After go-live, we read the data and improve: CTA, sections, forms, speed. Small fixes = big differences.

content.title: A page built to convert
content.subtitle: Design, copy and technology must work together.
content.body: We create conversion-focused layout and content, implement forms and CTAs, and configure events in GA4/GTM. If needed, we prepare A/B variants and integrate with email/CRM.

header.title: Landing pages for different goals
header.subtitle: Same logic: one goal, one page, one measurement.
header.body: We choose structure and content based on the action you want to generate.

items.title: Landing pages for Google Ads
items.description: Capture high-intent demand: clear promise, trust elements, direct CTAs and clean conversion tracking.

items.title: Landing pages for social campaigns
items.description: For colder traffic: more context, more proof, more guidance. Lean forms and microcopy that removes doubts.

items.title: “Request a quote” page
items.description: For service businesses: a structure that qualifies the lead, collects the right data and reduces time wasted on non-fit enquiries.

items.title: Event / webinar landing page
items.description: Registrations, agenda, speakers, limited seats and reminders—fully tracked to understand which channels drive sign-ups.

items.title: Lead magnet (PDF / guide)
items.description: Landing + thank-you page + email delivery: turn content into contacts and build a first-party list.

items.title: Landing pages for local service businesses
items.description: For local intent: immediate CTAs (call/WhatsApp), services overview, reviews and trust signals—built to convert fast.

content.eyebrow: Want to see if it makes sense?
